docs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
docs.text:
How do I remove access for a user?

How do I change the time zone for the dashboard?

How do I reset my password or two-factor?

I received an alarm for "Can't connect to the device"

How do I modify user group setings to allow Read/Write access?"

How do I send a user password reset e-mail or reset 2-factor authentication?

docs.title: Managing Users
docs.text:
Admins use this guide to create new users, change user permissions, and reset passwords and two-factor authentication.

  1. Use the three-line menu in the top left-hand corner to expand the toolbar.

  2. Use the left-hand menu to navigate to System Settings.

  3. Click the Settings Icon next to the user or select the add user icon to setup a new user.

  4. Use the left-hand menu to navigate to System Settings.

  5. Click the Settings Icon next to the user or select the add user icon to setup a new user Create New User

  6. Use the popup window to enter new user information.

  7. Use checkboxes to enable Admin Privileges and write permissions for tag and device configuration.

    Update User Settings and Reset Credentials

  8. Deactivate account to remove access to Specific Energy Dashboard.

  9. Adjust user write privileges with checkboxes.

  10. Use Reset buttons for Two-Factor and Password support.

docs.title: How do I modify user group setings to allow Read/Write access?
Admin may change within Settings menu:
docs.text:
1. Navigate to the user,

  2. click the settings (cog) icon next to the user name

  3. select "Modify Group Settings"

docs.title: How do I remove access for a user?
Admins may change within Settings menu:
docs.text:
1. Navigate to the System Settings

  2. Click the settings (cog) icon next to the user

  3. Deselect the Account is Active checkbox

*Only admins may change if the account is active

docs.title: How do I reset my password or two-factor?
docs.text: Two-factor requires contacting admin to do it for you but anyone with an account can reset their own password by following the "Forgot my password" reset flow.

docs.title: How do I send a user password reset e-mail or reset 2-factor authentication?
Admin may change within Settings menu:
docs.text:
1. Navigate to the user,

  2. click the settings (cog) icon next to the user name

  3. select "Send Password Reset E-mail" or "Reset Two-Factor" button.

docs.title: I received an alarm for "Can't connect to the device"
docs.text:
1) Confirm tagger is getting power,

2) confirm lights are active on the box,

3) if both of those are good, trying cycling power to the box ONCE

4) If problem persists, contact Specific Energy tech support or replace with spare.

docs.title: Accessing Specific Energy Dashboard
docs.text: 1. Login to Specific Energy Dashboard with UserID provided. 2. Enter Two-Factor code from Authenticator application.  3. Select Login.

docs.title: How do I change the time zone for the dashboard?
docs.text: All time-related widgets will show time based on the user's timezone or the timezone the user has selected in the navigation bar.

docs.title: Quick Reference Guide
docs.text: Devices → System settings → HMI Screens → Dashboards →
